CustomField.description: **System Calculated** The description of the customer payment method.
CustomField.formula:
IF(ISBLANK( OrderApi__Number__c ),"","- "&RIGHT(OrderApi__Number__c,7) )&
IF(ISBLANK( OrderApi__Card_Type__c ),""," ..." & OrderApi__Card_Type__c)&
IF(OR(ISBLANK( OrderApi__Month__c ),ISBLANK( OrderApi__Year__c )), "", " (" & TEXT(OrderApi__Month__c) & "/" & TEXT(OrderApi__Year__c) & ")")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: **System Calculated** The description of the customer payment method.
CustomField.label: Description
